posts.html:
Hey, great start with your hero section! Let's make your site even more amazing ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰

Quick Setup Guide
  1. Enable quick editing
    Turn on the "Edit shortcut" button to make site updates faster
  2. Essential setup
    Upload the routes.yaml file to unlock all theme features
  3. Build your site
    • Build your homepage
    • Create your blog page
    • Showcase your works
Resources & Support

ðŸ“š Read Braun Documentation
ðŸ’¬ Get Help from Support

Remember: Every great site started exactly where you are now. Let's get started! âœ¨
posts.plaintext:
Hey, great start with your hero section! Let's make your site even more amazing ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰

Quick Setup Guide

 1. Enable quick editing
    Turn on the "Edit shortcut" button to make site updates faster
 2. Essential setup
    Upload the routes.yaml file to unlock all theme features
 3. Build your site
    * Build your homepage
    * Create your blog page
    * Showcase your works

Resources & Support

ðŸ“š Read Braun Documentation
ðŸ’¬ Get Help from Support

Remember: Every great site started exactly where you are now. Let's get started! âœ¨
